# NSScroller.Part

**Enumeration**

These constants specify the different parts of the scroller:

## Declaration

```swift
enum Part
```

## Constants

- **NSScroller.Part.knob**: Directly to the scroller’s value, as given by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControl/floatValue].
- **NSScroller.Part.knobSlot**: Directly to the scroller’s value, as given by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControl/floatValue].
- **NSScroller.Part.decrementLine**: Up or left by a small amount.
- **NSScroller.Part.decrementPage**: Up or left by a large amount.
- **NSScroller.Part.incrementLine**: Down or right by a small amount.
- **NSScroller.Part.incrementPage**: Down or right by a large amount.
- **NSScroller.Part.noPart**: Don’t scroll at all.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **NSScroller.Style**: Constants to specify the scroller style.
- **NSScroller.KnobStyle**: Specify different knob styles.
- **NSScroller.Arrow**: These constants describe the two scroller buttons and are used by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScroller/drawArrow(_:highlight:)].
- **NSScroller.ArrowPosition**: These constants specify where the scroller’s buttons appear and are used by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScroller/arrowsPosition] property.
- **NSScroller.UsableParts**: These constants specify which parts of the scroller are visible.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
